The following bytes on a terminal to the nRF51 does a DFU of a simple set of data.
FWID:
BL 0x0001
SD 0x0064 (s110 v8.0)
Company ID: 0x00000059
App ID: 0x0001
App version: 0x00000002

Transaction ID: 0xddccbbaa
start addr: 0x018000
length: 64bytes
-----------------------
0x1178feff6400010059000000010002000000
0x1378fdff0407aabbccdd59000000010002000000
0x1478fcff0000aabbccdd00800100a900000000000C

DATA packets:
0x1978fcff0100aabbccdd08280020F58001000F81010011810100
0x1978fcff0200aabbccdd00000000000000000000000000000000
0x1978fcff0300aabbccdd00000000000000000000000013810100
0x1978fcff0400aabbccdd00000000000000001581010017810100
0x1978fcff0500aabbccdd19810100198101001981010019810100
0x1978fcff0600aabbccdd19810100000000001981010019810100
0x1978fcff0700aabbccdd19810100198101001981010019810100
0x1978fcff0800aabbccdd19810100198101001981010019810100
0x1978fcff0900aabbccdd19810100198101001981010019810100
0x1978fcff0a00aabbccdd19810100198101001981010019810100
0x1978fcff0b00aabbccdd19810100198101000000000000000000
0x1978fcff0c00aabbccdd00000000000000000000000000000000
0x1978fcff0d00aabbccdd0348854600F032F8004800470D820100
0x1978fcff0e00aabbccdd08280020401E00BF00BF00BF00BF00BF
0x1978fcff0f00aabbccdd00BF00BF00BF00BF00BF00BF00BFF1D1
0x1978fcff1000aabbccdd704700000321094802680A4302600848
0x1978fcff1100aabbccdd02680A4302600748804707480047FEE7
0x1978fcff1200aabbccddFEE7FEE7FEE7FEE7FEE7000024050040
0x1978fcff1300aabbccdd5405004051810100C1800100064C0125
0x1978fcff1400aabbccdd064E05E0E36807CC2B430C3C98471034
0x1978fcff1500aabbccddB442F7D3FFF7C0FF80820100A0820100
0x1978fcff1600aabbccdd10B500F037F8002805D00E490C484860
0x1978fcff1700aabbccddC8130D4988610D48018CC9B201290ED1
0x1978fcff1800aabbccdd818C09070BD1018D0906090F042906D1
0x1978fcff1900aabbccdd808D0006000F02D105490120886010BD
0x1978fcff1a00aabbccddDFFF07C000050040006C0040C00F00F0

0x1978fcff1c00aabbccdd70477047002001E001C1121F002AFBD1
0x1978fcff1d00aabbccdd704700001048018CC9B2012917D1818C
